snippet: The Republican-controlled Legislature on Friday banned abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy, overriding the governor’s veto and joining 11 other states in prohibiting abortion at that point.
abstract: West Virginia Legislature bans abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy, overriding veto by Gov Earl Ray Tomblin.
lead_paragraph: The Republican-controlled Legislature on Friday banned abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy, overriding the governor’s veto and joining 11 other states in prohibiting abortion at that point.

headline.main: West Virginia: Veto of Abortion Curb Is Overturned
headline.print_headline: West Virginia: Veto of Abortion Curb Is Overturned
